markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Ki Exemplar](/Feats.aspx?ID=4062) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 222</row>

**Archetype** [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18)

**Prerequisites**
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900)

</column>

---

You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: [_unblinking flame emblem_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1245) for Unblinking Flame, [_unbreaking wave barrier_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1247) for Unbreaking Waves, [_unfolding wind blitz_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1250) for Unfolding Wind, or [_untwisting iron augmentation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1253) for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You become an expert in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.

<title level="2">Perfect Ki Exemplar leads to...</title>
[Perfect Ki Grandmaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=4063)
name: Perfect Ki Exemplar
